name: Umbra (itch) (Lio Lim)
description:
Umbra is remaster of the 1981 arcade game Centipede. Blast you way through waves of creepy crawlies as they charge towards you. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, hold Space to shoot

Made in 2 weeks for GDKO 2023 - Round 4
Theme: Recreate the Atari 2600 game Centipede

Dev highscore: 83912
